Ultimate Vision #0
Learn the origin of the space-faring robot known as the Vision Ã¢â‚¬â€ and get ready for next monthÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s debut of her all-new limited series! Join Ultimates 2 and Civil War writer Mark Millar and The EternalsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ John Romita Jr. in this special edition that collects all six backup stories from the pages of the Ultimate comics. Delve into the motivation and mission of this most fascinating new Ultimate character!

Ultimate Vision #1
Picking up directly from the events in the smash hit limited series ULTIMATE EXTINCTION!  The Earth was saved from the Ultimate threat Ã¢â‚¬â€ Gah Lak Tus. But scientist George Tarleton has captured a piece of that awesome entity and plans to reactivate it for his own evil purposes. The only hope for mankind against this mad scheme Ã¢â‚¬â€ the strange alien being called The Vision!

Ultimate Vision #2
The Gah Lak Tus module, an object of immense cosmic power, is now in the murderous hands of George TarletonÃ¢â‚¬â€leader of the sinister organization A.I.M. And with the otherworldly Vision down, nothing stands in the way of total conquest of Earth by this alien force.

Ultimate Vision #3
Despite the efforts of the alien Vision, the unimaginably powerful Gah Lak Tus module draws into its core the energies of the A.I.M. orbital research station and then makes landfall on Earth. And this lone instrument may accomplish what countless of its robotic brethren could notÃ¢â‚¬â€the utter destruction of our helpless planet. 

Ultimate Vision #4
The Gah Lak Tus module has landed on Earth! And nothing in manÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s arsenal can even give it pause! The other-worldly Vision is our last hope, but she was designed for communication purposes, not lethal combat. Can she adapt in time, or has our poor planet run out of luck? DonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t miss it! 

Ultimate Vision #5
The Gah Lak Tus module is sinking its alien cables down into the EarthÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s core as it draws the planetÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s elemental energies deep into itself. And the only chance Ultimate Vision has to defeat the module isÃ¢â‚¬â€to talk it to death! And when the Vision speaksÃ¢â‚¬â€run for cover! A fitting finale to one of the finer limited series of the year.
